TopicTitle: What mod is changing how fairings work?

Articles.Content:
I'm setting up a new game, and have added just a few mods over the mod list from the previous game, and as far as I remember none of them have anything to do with fairings.

But now, in game, the normal Build Fairing/Delete Fairing/Edit Fairing commands have been replaced by the below UI. What's worse, it doesn't' seem to work, when I go to fly there are no fairings.

Does anyone know which mod is doing this? I have about 200 mods so narrowing it down manually can take a while
Procedural Fairings - this is intended behavior. There are nodes on the side of the fairing, attach "Procedural Fairing" parts to them to make the actual fairing.

2 hours ago, Al2Me6 said:

Procedural Fairings - this is intended behavior. There are nodes on the side of the fairing, attach "Procedural Fairing" parts to them to make the actual fairing.

Thanks Al2Me6
